Class VoltageImage

java.lang.Object
voltage.core.VoltageComponent

public class VoltageImage
extends VoltageComponent
Display images and animations

  • Constructor Details

    • VoltageImage

      public VoltageImage​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String displayName, VoltageModule module, boolean bIsAnimation)
      Creates the Voltage Image object.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the control
      displayName - the display name of the control
      module - the module this belongs to
      bIsAnimation - set to true if this is an animation.

    • VoltageImage

      public VoltageImage​(java.lang.String name, VoltageModule module, boolean bIsAnimation)
      Creates the Voltage Image object.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the control
      module - the module this belongs to
      bIsAnimation - set to true if this is an animation.

  • Method Details

    • SetCurrentImage

      public void SetCurrentImage​(java.lang.String resourceName)
      Sets the image.
      Parameters:
      resourceName - the resource name of the image.

    • AddNewImage

      public void AddNewImage​(java.lang.String resourceName)
      Adds a new image to an animation. This will append the image to the last frame.
      Parameters:
      resourceName - the resource name of the image.

    • AddImageFromMemory

      public void AddImageFromMemory​(byte[] data)
      Adds a new image to an animation from memory.
      Parameters:
      data - contents of an image file. (Note this is not pixels and represents a file like png, jpg, etc)

    • Clear

      public void Clear()
      Clears any images from this control.

    • GetNumberOfFrames

      public int GetNumberOfFrames()
      Returns the number of frames.
      Returns:
      the number of frames in this animation.

    • SetCurrentFrame

      public void SetCurrentFrame​(int curFrame)
      Sets the current frame.
      Parameters:
      curFrame - the frame index to set.

    • GetCurrentFrame

      public int GetCurrentFrame()
      Gets the current frame
      Returns:
      the current frame index.

    • SetAnimationSpeed

      public void SetAnimationSpeed​(int milsPerFrame, boolean bReset)
      Sets the animation speed.
      Parameters:
      milsPerFrame - the number of milliseconds per frame.
      bReset - if the animation is running, this will restart it at the new frame rate from the current frame.

    • Animate

      public void Animate​(boolean bLoop)
      Starts the animation This starts animating.
      Parameters:
      bLoop - a flag to determine if it will loop.

    • SetAnimateMode

      public void SetAnimateMode​(VoltageImage.AnimationMode animMode)
      Sets the mode of an animation
      Parameters:
      animMode - the animation mode.

    • StartAnimation

      public void StartAnimation​(VoltageImage.AnimationMode animMode, boolean bLoopAnimation, int milsPerFrame, int startImage)
      Start the animation and sets the options in one call.
      Parameters:
      animMode - is the type of animation.
      bLoopAnimation - should the animation loop continuously?
      milsPerFrame - the number of milliseconds for each frame of the animation.
      startImage - the frame to start on.
